author: jerenkrantz
msg: * README: Leave a documentation breadcrumb for VPATH builds.
* SConstruct: Remove leading whitespace.
(I thought I was committing r2069 to trunk not 1.3.x.  I won't try to confuse
SVN too much and merge 1.3.x into trunk.  *grin*)

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * README: Leave a documentation breadcrumb for VPATH builds.
* SConstruct: Remove leading whitespace.

author: lgo
msg: On the 1.3.x branch:
Merge all pending important code fixes from trunk:
r2045: Initialize *LEN before returning APR_EOF.
r2046: Fix issue with Digest authn to a proxy when setting up an ssl
tunnel.
r2022+r2023: only pause writing to the connection when the (ssl) bucket
explicitly told the context loop to do so.

author: lgo
msg: On the 1.3.x branch:
Merge all pending scons build inmprovements from trunk:
r2035: Add CC, CFLAGS, LINKFLAGS, LIBS and CPPFLAGS variables
r2041: Fix scons -c and scons --help on Windows.
r2042: Blacklist serf v2 API in gen_def.py
r2047+r2048+r2054+r2063: Get the test suite to build and run on Windows.
r2050+r2051+r2052+r2053+r2058+r2059: Get serf to build on Windows.
